storyInfo: The crisis in The Afterglow is averted, but an even crueler fate awaits Ebenholz and Kreide.

attributes.content: Stupid, foolish boy...
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: You didn't have to do this.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: Why would you go so far for a world that owes you so much?
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: Sir?!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You must leave now! Originium activity is rising rapidly in this area!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I want to see my grandson one last time.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: Only a little further, Hibiscus. Distract him...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Kreide, grandpa's here.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Kreide, my boy.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: Vent whatever anger you have on me.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: Come to me, before you do any more harm!
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: I've deceived you for so many years... I thought about dying for your sake, but I never thought you would come to an end like this.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: If your choice is to let the others live, why not let me come with you in my last days?
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: Let me join you on your final journey, my boy!
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: The crystalline monster no longer understands the old man's words.
The flash of lucidity was a fleeting miracle. All the monster can think about now is dragging everything around it into emptiness, dancing to his cello's tune.
The monster follows the sound, playing a song of death.
Sir?!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Young lady, why do you—
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: I'll hold down the fort here, Ebenholz. Now!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Ha!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: How?!
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Friendship, dedication, sacrifice—such childish ideals should have been shattered upon contact with reality. How? How?!
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: It's not over yet!
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Kreide may have forcibly assimilated two verses of the Voice of Mundane, but he could not overcome the disorder and madness of their amalgamation!
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Kreide's melody has faded, but Ebenholz's Voice lingers. I—
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Argh!
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Enough, Gräfin Strollo.
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: Gertrude's limp hand drops from the strings.
Biegler withdraws his dagger from Gertrude's back. The blood stains his clothes red.
The Originium outer shell cracks and falls apart.
The plaza falls silent, the only sound being inert pieces of Originium shell falling to the ground.
Finally, the shell shatters completely, leaving behind Kreide lying on the ground with his cello.
Wait for me... wait for me!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: No! It's dangerous. We should call Infected Palliative Services...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: What are you saying?!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Kreide won't die!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: You're awake, Kreide!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: See? He'll be fine!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Ebenholz...?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I'm here, it's me!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Don't... don't bother. I...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: (Takes a deep breath)
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I feel... so light...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: It hurt so much... but I feel better now...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Yes, you'll get better... yes...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Listen carefully, Ebenholz. This is the last time I'll be able to talk to you.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Remember my words.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Live on, Ebenholz, and walk through the long night.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Fight injustice, and treat others with generosity and charity.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Only by doing so will I live on in your memory.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I'll ask you, how did your day go, Ebenholz?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: And you'll tell me proudly that you had a good and productive day.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: You'll tell me about the challenges you face while doing good, and complain about how fate is a miser.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: And it will be okay, because I'll be listening.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: It's alright to complain a little, when you've worked so hard.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Only by doing so will you rise above pain and suffering, and find peace in your heart.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Remember that we've fought together against cruel fate and won.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: When you think of me, laugh. Don't cry.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Yes, yes!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: And Ebenholz... I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I haven't thought about what token... to give you...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Anything's fine. Just don't die... please...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Kreide... Kreide...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Kreide!!!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: They'll find themselves shattered someday, but that day is not today.
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: Friendship, dedication, sacrifice...
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: They may be naive, but someone will shed a tear for them.
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: What about you, though, Gräfin Strollo?
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: You destroyed your friendship with Czerny by your own hands.
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: You killed your own brother and laughed at his incompetence.
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: You want others to sacrifice for you, but what have you done for them?
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.text: Gertrude lies limp on the ground, with only her lips moving slightly.
'May you die in a dark ditch.'
'May the madness of Ebenholz's bloodline haunt him forever.'
'May Leithanien ever tremble in the shadow of the Witch King.'
'May the Witch King never know the peace of death.'

attributes.content: Pathetic.
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: Maybe I acted out of impulse, but dealing with threats to public safety is also part of my job.
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: I'll be sure to mention you in my report, Gräfin Strollo.
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: Good night. I hope your dreams don't involve cursing anybody.
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: Your hand's bleeding! Did you get scratched by Originium crystals?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Ah, yes... I guess there's a bit of blood...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You need treatment immediately—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Treatment? It's Kreide who needs treatment!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Ebenholz, he's...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Don't.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Don't say it, Hibiscus. I beg you...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: He... he's Infected, Ebenholz. If you don't want Palliative Services to get involved, at least find a room that's isolated, for his own sake.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I know, I know...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: The lounge at the concert hall.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Alright, I'll take him there.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Come, Kreide. I'll carry you.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Ebenholz lifts Kreide up. The Originium crystals inflict more wounds on him, but he pays them no heed.
He carries his friend, even as he feels the body cooling, as though embracing a short but sweet dream.
We're almost there, Kreide.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Just a little longer.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Kreide?

attributes.content: You're—You're still alive!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I'll take you to Hibiscus—
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Lay me to rest in this building.
attributes.name: Kreide?

attributes.content: If you return to The Afterglow someday, you'll remember that you once had a good friend, with whom you've laughed and argued here...
attributes.name: Kreide?

attributes.content: And at the last, put on a duet to remember.
attributes.name: Kreide?

attributes.content: No. You're not Kreide. You're—
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Isn't this what you wanted?
attributes.name: Kreide?

attributes.content: Shut your mouth. I won't allow you to defile his memory.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Kreide gave his life to cleanse the Voice of Mundane, but it's still in my head?!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I warn you... don't think I'll hesitate to blow my own head off, if you dare imitate him one more time.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (Sighs)
attributes.name: The Voice in His Head

attributes.content: My foolish bloodline.
attributes.name: The Voice in His Head

attributes.content: Ebenholz no longer hears the voice.
He walks toward the lounge in Afterglow Hall, Kreide's body growing heavier in his arms with each step.
We're here.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I'll seal the room. Lie down on the sofa.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: It's soft. It'll feel nice.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Sofa, soft...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You've never slept on one at home...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Looks like I've been infected.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Arts that once took so much effort now feel so simple. Maybe getting infected isn't so bad after all.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: That should do it. I'll seal the door from the outside.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Anything else?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: A token... yes, a token.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I'll take the cello.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Look at me, taking back something I bought for you.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Ebenholz's lips tremble.
He stands wordless for a moment before laying his flute at Kreide's side.
You said you wanted a coin with a hole, but the only thing I have left is this flute...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: So sorry...
attributes.name: Ebenholz
